description: Documentation for 9.7.16.10.7.2. Scale Factor A ID

files.title: Overview
files.summary: The value of the scale factor `A ID` selects the sub-columns in the Tensor Memory to form the scale factor `A` matrix, which is used to scale the matrix `A`.

files.title: tcgen05-mma-scale-factor-a-layout-1x
files.summary: There is one scale factor per row of the `A` matrix with block size as 32 and the scale factor must be provided in 1-byte aligned sub-column of the Tensor Memory. *SFA\_ID* specifies the byte offset in the Tensor Memory word that must be used for the scale factor matrix.
